info.description:
-Coordinates made more visible, will always show outside of board.
-White / black will now have coordinates on different side.
-Notation font made monospaced, icons removed.
info.additionalInfo: Check out my other lichess styles: https://userstyles.org/users/331366 To report a bug feel free to PM me on lichess.org: https://en.lichess.org/@/juansnow VER 0.03: -Fixed spacing issues of the coords on the right side of the board, still not perfect but passable.
